pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Stress Relief Body Wash Lavender, Chamomile and Ylang-Ylang Essences 354mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

A stress relief body wash with natural colloidal oatmeal, lavendar, chamomile and ylang-ylang oils which helps to calm and relax.

General Information

AVEENO® Stress Relief Body Wash 354mL

Aveeno Stress Relief Body Wash helps to calm, relax and improve your sense of well-being in the shower while cleansing and moisturising, so your skin feels soft and smooth all day long. This moisturising body wash combines the soothing properties of colloidal oatmeal, long known for its ability to moisturise with the relaxing essences of lavender, essential chamomile and ylang-ylang oils, known for their calming benefits. This creamy formula gently cleanses, moisturises and soothes dry skin, leaving skin softer and smoother all day long. And it's soap-free and dye-free so it's even gentle enough for sensitive skin.

Size: 354mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour,ydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Glycol Distearate, Polyquarternium-10, Quaternium-15, Myristyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Fragrance (with Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis nobilis Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil).(F#11165-058)

Directions

For Daily Use: squeeze body wash onto a wet pouf, washcloth or hands. Work into a rich, creamy lather, then rinse.

For Shaving: apply by hand as a shaving lotion for silky, smooth legs.
